pages.text: 91|1|Yi taiyang ji qi guanghui fashi,
91|2|yi zhuisui taiyang shi de yueliang fashi,
91|3|yi jieshi taiyang shi de baizhou fashi,
91|4|yi longzhao taiyang shi de heiye fashi,
91|5|yi cangqiong ji qi jianzhu zhe fashi,
91|6|yi dadi ji qi puzhan zhe fashi,
91|7|yi linghun jishi ta junheng,
91|8|bing qishi ta shan e zhe fashi,
91|9|fan peiyang ziji di xingling zhe, biding chenggong;
91|10|fan qianghai ziji di xingling zhe, biding shibai.
91|11|Sai mo de ren yi yin guofen er fouren zhenli.
91|12|Dangshi, tamen zhong zui boming zhe mang shang qian lai,
91|13|shizhe jiu dui tamen shuo:“Nimen rang an la de mu tuo ziyou yinshui ba.”
91|14|Dan tamen fouren shizhe er zaisha mu tuo, gu tamen de zhuyin tamen de zuiguo er huimie tamen, shi tamen pubian shounan.
91|15|Ta shi bu gulu na zainan de houguo de.
92|1|Yi longzhao shi de heiye fashi,
92|2|yi xianzhu shi de baizhou fashi,
92|3|yi chuangzao nanxing he nuxing de zhu fashi,
92|4|nimen de xingwei, que shi butong de.
92|5|Zhiyu zhenji pinmin, jingwei an la,
92|6|qie chengren zhi shan zhe,
92|7|wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui yi de jieju.
92|8|Zhiyu linxi qiancai, zi wei wu qiu,
92|9|qie fouren zhi shan zhe,
92|10|wo jiang shi ta yiyu dadao zui nan de jieju.
92|11|Dang ta lunwang de shihou, ta de caichan yu ta you she me biyi ne!
92|12|Wo que you zhidao de zeren,
92|13|wo que you houshi he jinshi de zhuquan.
92|14|Guwo jinggao nimen yi zhong fa yan de huo,
